CHICAGO FORGING & MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. BASSICK COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 417. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 14, 1934. Bristol .& White, of New Haven, Conn., and Donald M. Carter, of Chicago, 111., for plaintiffi-appellant. Stephen H. Philhin, of New York City, and D. Lewis Mattem, of Bridgeport, Conn., for defendant-appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [60 F.(2d) 581] affirmed.
